ScriptGroup.name: Communications

Script.name: Communications Display Echo
Script.script:
function communications:echo(what, debug, err) local comms_tag = "<dark_khaki>(<sienna>communications<dark_khaki>): <white>" local debug_tag = "<deep_sky_blue>(<royal_blue>debug<deep_sky_blue>): <white>" local err_tag = "<coral>(<red>error<coral>): <white>"
if debug and not self.configs.dbug then return end if what:sub(0,1)=="\n" then cecho("\n") what = what:sub(2) end cecho(comms_tag) if debug then cecho(debug_tag) end if err then cecho(err_tag) end cecho(what) end

Script.name: Set Communications Configuration Values
Script.script: function communications:setConfigs() local defaults = self.defaults or {} local configs = self.configs or {} -- load stored configs from file if it exists if io.exists(getMudletHomeDir().."/communications.configs.lua") then self:echo("Loading communications configurations.\n") table.load(getMudletHomeDir().."/communications.configs.lua",configs) self:echo("Communications configurations loaded.\n") end -- overwrite default values with stored config values configs = table.update(defaults, configs) self.configs = configs end

Script.name: CommsOnSysConnectionEvent
Script.script:
function CommsOnSysConnectionEvent(event) communications:setConfigs()
if communications.configs.comms_window.visible then communications:showComms(true) end end

Script.name: CommsOnSysDisconnectionEvent
Show Comms
Script.script:
function communications:showComms(bval) local visible = bval self.configs.comms_window.visible = visible local configs = self.configs.comms_window local x, y, w, h = configs.x, configs.y, configs.w, configs.h
communications.container = communications.container or Adjustable.Container:new( { name = "communications_container", adjLabelstyle = "background-color:rgba(220,220,220,100%); border: 5px groove grey;", buttonstyle = [[ QLabel{ border-radius: 7px; background-color: rgba(140,140,140,100%);} QLabel::hover{ background-color: rgba(160,160,160,50%);} ]], buttonFontSize = 10, buttonsize = 20, titleText = "Communications", titleTxtColor = "black", padding = 15, } ) communications.current_tab = communications.current_tab or communications.tabs[1] communications.container:move(x, y) communications.container:resize(w, h)
communications.header = communications.header or Geyser.HBox:new( {name = "communications.header", x = 0, y = 0, width = "100%", height = "10%"}, communications.container )
communications.footer = communications.footer or Geyser.Label:new( {name = "communications.footer", x = 0, y = "10%", width = "100%", height = "90%"}, communications.container )
communications.footer:setStyleSheet([[ background-color: black; ]])
for k, v in pairs(communications.tabs) do communications[v .. "_tab"] = communications[v .. "_tab"] or Geyser.Label:new({name = "communications." .. v .. "_tab"}, communications.header) communications[v .. "_tab"]:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: ]] .. communications.tab_color .. [[; border-top-left-radius: 10px; border-top-right-radius: 10px; margin-right: 1px; margin-left: 1px; ]] ) communications[v .. "_tab"]:echo("<center>" .. v) communications[v .. "_tab"]:setClickCallback("communications.click", v)
communications[v] = communications[v] or Geyser.MiniConsole:new( { name = "communications." .. v, x = "0%", y = "0%", width = "100%", height = "100%", }, communications.footer ) communications[v]:enableAutoWrap() communications[v]:setColor("black") communications[v]:setFontSize(configs.fontsize) communications[v]:bg("black") communications[v]:fg("white") communications[v]:hide() end
if visible then communications.container:show() communications[communications.current_tab]:show() else communications.container:hide() end
x = tonumber(string.sub(x, 1, -2)) y = tonumber(string.sub(y, 1, -2)) w = tonumber(string.sub(w, 1, -2)) h = tonumber(string.sub(h, 1, -2)) if x < 0 then x = x + 100 end if y < 0 then y = y + 100 end
if configs.dock then if y < h then communications.container:attachToBorder("top") else if x + 0.5 * w > 50 then communications.container:attachToBorder("right") else communications.container:attachToBorder("left") end end else communications.container:attachToBorder("float") end end
function communications.click(tab) communications[communications.current_tab]:hide() communications.current_tab = tab communications[communications.current_tab]:show() end

Script.name: Append Comms
Comms Help
Comms Window Reposition
Script.script:
function commsFinishedRepositioning(eventName, containerName, width, height, x, y) if containerName ~= "communications_container" then return end local mx, my = getMainWindowSize() x = x/mx*100 y = y/my*100 width = width/mx*100 height = height/my*100
communications.configs.comms_window.x = x.."%" communications.configs.comms_window.y = y.."%" communications.configs.comms_window.w = width.."%" communications.configs.comms_window.h = height.."%"
communications:showComms(true) end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("AdjustableContainerRepositionFinish", "commsFinishedRepositioning")

Script.name: CommunicationsInstallerSuccess
Script.script: function CommunicationsInstallerSuccess(_, name) --if installed file is not the desired one if name ~= "communications_scripts" then return end communications:show_help() communications:setConfigs() if communications.configs.comms_window.visible then communications:showComms(true) end end
